courses.title: Introduction to Music Theory
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of music theory, including notes, scales, chords, and rhythm.

courses.title: Music Production Essentials
courses.description: A comprehensive guide to digital music production, recording, and mixing techniques.

courses.title: Classical Piano Mastery
courses.description: Master classical piano techniques, including hand positioning, dynamics, and famous compositions.

courses.title: Advanced Music Composition
courses.description: An in-depth course on songwriting, orchestration, and composing for different genres.

courses.title: Guitar for Beginners
courses.description: Learn basic chords, strumming patterns, and simple songs to start playing the guitar.

courses.title: Music Business and Marketing
courses.description: Understand the music industry, branding, and marketing strategies for musicians.

courses.title: Jazz Improvisation Techniques
courses.description: Dive deep into jazz theory, scales, and improvisation techniques for various instruments.

courses.title: Vocal Training and Performance
courses.description: Master vocal techniques, breathing exercises, and stage performance skills.

courses.title: Drumming and Rhythm Mastery
courses.description: Learn drumming techniques, time signatures, and rhythm patterns across different styles.

courses.title: Live Sound Engineering
courses.description: Understand live sound setups, mixing consoles, and audio equipment for concerts.
